summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4384 for the improvement of the alley between Block 3, Pettit's University Addition and Block 11, Assessor's Plat of University Heights Addition, being the alley from East 50th Street to East 52nd Street, between 12th Avenue Northeast and Brooklyn Avenue; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 51852, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
